skills.title: E-Commerce Solutions That Drive Sales
skills.description: Crafting seamless and user-friendly online stores to boost your business and enhance the shopping experience.

skills.title: Custom Landing Pages That Convert
skills.description: Designing strategic, high-impact landing pages to transform clicks into leads and customers.

skills.title: Small Business Websites Built for Growth
skills.description: Empowering small businesses with professional, scalable websites tailored to your unique goals.

skills.title: Website Design That Captivates and Engages
skills.description: Creating visually stunning and functional designs that leave a lasting impression on your audience.

skills.title: Revamping Existing Websites for Modern Performance
skills.description: Transforming outdated sites into dynamic, high-performing platforms that align with your brand's vision.

projects.title: Waveyâ€™s World Hub - The Comedian's Digital Central
projects.description: A sleek and engaging website for Wavey, a comedian who needed a one-stop hub for his work. Features include Shopify integration for merchandise, an events page to buy tickets directly, and a contact page to connect with fans and collaborators.

projects.title: Tech Woke - The Ultimate Tech Podcast Platform
projects.description: A modern, functional website for Tech Woke, providing a centralized space to watch podcast episodes. Integrated with embedded YouTube videos for seamless episode viewing.

projects.title: Nonprofit Art Studio - Empowering Creativity Through STEM
projects.description: Designed and built a dynamic website for a nonprofit art and STEM studio. Highlights include Mailchimp integration for newsletters and updates, enabling the organization to connect with its community more effectively.

projects.title: Fresh & Clean - Carpet Cleaner Website Solution
projects.description: Built a professional online presence for a carpet cleaning service, complete with booking and contact forms. Handled all aspects of design, copywriting, and image sourcing to deliver a cohesive and impactful site.

projects.title: The Media Kit - Showcasing Creativity with Style
projects.description: Designed a professional media kit using Canva, tailored to highlight my personal brand. Features include visually engaging charts and phone video mockups, providing a sleek, mobile-friendly way to showcase work, metrics, and achievements to collaborators and potential partners.

projects.title: LinkHub - The Custom Coded Linktree Alternative
projects.description: Developed a fully custom-coded Linktree-style solution with an added shop section. Perfect for creators and entrepreneurs seeking a centralized platform to showcase their links, sell products, and stand out with a unique, personalized design.

graphics.title: Black Friday Social Media Graphic
graphics.description: An eye-catching Black Friday graphic created to highlight major sales and promotions. Designed for maximum engagement, it combines dark tones with bold call-to-action elements for an impactful online presence.

graphics.title: Promotional Graphic for Cleaning Services
graphics.description: A vibrant and engaging promotional graphic for cleaning services, highlighting a limited-time offer with a clean design and pastel color palette. Ideal for social media marketing to attract new customers and promote service discounts.

graphics.title: Cyber Monday Sale
graphics.description: A bold and dynamic Cyber Monday sale graphic designed to boost online sales. Featuring attention-grabbing typography and a sleek layout, this graphic is tailored for driving traffic during the holiday shopping season.

freebies.title: Vision Bingo Card for 2025 - Midnight Glow
freebies.description: Set your 2025 goals in style with the Midnight Glow Bingo Card! Featuring a sleek, bold design in navy and golden hues, this template is perfect for a clean and motivational look. All elements, including the stickers, are free Canva elements, so you can customize everything to your liking!

freebies.title: Vision Bingo Card for 2025 - Smiley Goals Collection
freebies.description: Brighten up your goal-setting journey with the Smiley Goals Collection! These three cheerful designs feature playful daisies and vibrant themes. Each card is fully customizable in Canva using free Canva elements, including fun stickers to personalize your goals.

freebies.title: Vision Bingo Card for 2025 - Dreamy Aura
freebies.description: Visualize your dreams with the ethereal Dreamy Aura Bingo Card. With soft purple clouds and elegant typography, this design inspires you to shoot for the stars. All stickers and design elements are free Canva elements, making it easy for you to customize directly in Canva.
